dcterms:creator: G. B. Huang
M. Mattar
T. Berg
E. Learned-Miller
dcterms:description: A database for studying face recognition in unconstrained environments, which has been widely used for evaluating face recognition systems.
dcterms:title: Labeled Faces in the Wild (LFW)

dcterms:creator: M. Knoche
S. Hormann
G. Rigoll
dcterms:description: A database designed to analyze cross-resolution image face recognition in unconstrained environments, featuring images with varying levels of degradation.
dcterms:title: Cross-Quality LFW (XQLFW)
